creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
markings: hand-applied red artist's seal: 深水 {Shinsui}; LRC, red publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
signed: hand-applied 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui) | pencil: 23/100
text: This print is after Shinsui’s painting Red Gloves (Portrait of a Woman), from 1957, now in the Yamatane Museum, Tokyo.
title: A Woman in Western Dress
